description: Linker sequences for inserting VHH nanobodies into capsid variable regions. Designs range from flexible (GGGGS repeats) to rigid (coiled-coil).

parts.name: Linker Design 1 N-terminal
parts.description: Symmetric flexible linker - N-terminal side. (GGGGS)x5 provides high conformational entropy.
parts.notes: Long flexible linker. May reduce display efficiency but maximizes VHH mobility.

parts.name: Linker Design 1 C-terminal
parts.description: Symmetric flexible linker - C-terminal side. Single (GGGGS) unit.
parts.notes: Short return linker. Pairs with LINK_D1_N for symmetric design.

parts.name: Linker Design 2 N-terminal
parts.notes: Recommended for high-affinity binders. Provides flexibility with moderate length.

parts.name: Linker Design 2 C-terminal
parts.description: Asymmetric design - Direct fusion (no linker on C-terminal side).
parts.notes: No C-terminal linker. VHH C-terminus fuses directly to capsid. Minimizes insertional size.

parts.name: Linker Design 7 Leading Coil
parts.description: Coiled-coil alpha helix (leading/outgoing strand). Rigid structured linker.
parts.notes: DNA sequence is specified exactly to ensure proper folding kinetics. Do not back-translate. Pairs with LINK_D7_RETURN to form antiparallel coiled-coil.

parts.name: Linker Design 7 Returning Coil
parts.description: Coiled-coil alpha helix (returning strand). Forms antiparallel heterodimer with Leading Coil.
parts.notes: DNA sequence is specified exactly. Forms stable antiparallel coiled-coil with LINK_D7_LEAD. Best for low-affinity VHHs that need structural stabilization.

parts.name: Rigid Alpha-Helical Linker
parts.description: Rigid linker based on (EAAAK) repeats. Forms alpha helix.
parts.notes: Alternative to coiled-coil for applications requiring rigidity. Single chain, no heterodimerization required.
